titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow expenses relating to all home schools to be qualified education expenses for purposes of a Coverdell education savings account.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow expenses relating to all home schools to be qualified education expenses for purposes of a Coverdell education savings account.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow payment of home school expenses from Coverdell education savings accounts.
